t: Amazon.com: The Afrocentric Idea: 9780877225737: Asante, Molefi Kete: Books
s: This book (along with Theory for Social Change) saved my spirit and will save the spirit of any Black person that reads it. It is incredible and the Elder covers just about every aspect pertaining to the Black experience. This book is a precursor to Pan Africanism.
